comments:
Build ID: I

Steps To Reproduce:
1. In RAP demo comment this line (in theme.properties):
#shell.title.inactive.bgimage: /theme1/icons/titlebar.png
2. Launch application
3. Call application from browser and then It appears in console:

java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: Resource 'resource/widget/rap/window/caption_inactive.gif' not found for theme 'Alternative Demo Theme'
	at org.eclipse.rwt.internal.theme.ThemeManager.registerWidgetImages(ThemeManager.java:632)
	at org.eclipse.rwt.internal.theme.ThemeManager.registerThemeFiles(ThemeManager.java:561)
	at org.eclipse.rwt.internal.theme.ThemeManager.registerResources(ThemeManager.java:282)
	at org.eclipse.swt.internal.widgets.displaykit.DisplayLCA.writeLibraries(DisplayLCA.java:201)



More information:
I'm using the latest CVS version of RAP projects.

This problem only happens if you register a theme and don't define a value for "shell.title.inactive.bgimage" property then when RAP application tries to register default image for this property fails, but Image file is in project and all seems to be OK.

The ThemeManager tried to load the image with the wrong ResourceLoader.
Fixed in CVS HEAD.

traces.message: Resource 'resource/widget/rap/window/caption_inactive.gif' not found for theme 'Alternative Demo Theme'
